Yemeni President on Friendly Relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The relations between the two countries are on very good terms and Yemen values the relations with the DPRK and will make strenuous efforts to boost the friendly relations with the DPRK.
 Ali Abdullah Saleh, president of the Republic of Yemen, said this when receiving credentials from Jon Hui Jong, new DPRK ambassador e. p. to the country, on March 16.    
 He hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater success in the struggle under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

Preparatory Committee Formed in Egypt 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was inaugurated in Cairo on March 15 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 Muhammad al Husseini al Akad, vice-minister of Agriculture, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee set the period from March 15 to April 15 for commemoration of the Day of the Sun and decided to hold colorful functions including commemoration meeting, remembrance meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition in this period.

Reception Given by Russian Consul General 
    Chongjin, March 19 (KCNA) -- Arkady Lavrov, Russian consul general in Chongjin, hosted a reception at the Consulate General on March 18 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the signing of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
 Invited there were Pak Su Gil, chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Tunisia
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Zine el Abidine Ben Ali, president of the Republic of Tunisia, on Mar. 19 on the occasion of the 48th national day.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would more favorably develop in the future, the message sincerely wished him and the people of Tunisia greater success in their work to build a new prosperous society.
